channel.title: Not jumping high enough (?)
channel.description:
Hi, great game from the past! Congrats!
I'm having lot's of trouble jumping on top of things. It seems I cannot jump high enough. Can't climb on top of anything the same height (or bigger) than the metal barrels (horizontally).
It seems like a bug of some kind (?) or a bad game instalation (?) because I've seen walkthrough videos and they all jump very easy on top the very same things, and for me it's impossible. So I'm stuck in the game. :'(
Help! Thanks.

item.title: Not jumping high enough (?)
item.dc:creator: taq
item.description:
Yeah, I completely forgot about the “special” jump with crouch (control). Damn!
thanks a lot! so frustrating

Read full topic

item.title: Not jumping high enough (?)
item.dc:creator: Whiskeyclone
item.description:
Are you hitting Crouch, which is bound to left ctrl for me, after jumping?

Read full topic

item.description:
Great!.. not great, I mean, I thought I was the only one.
